name: Centur-Ion Arkcoela
text:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
Face-up cards in your Spell & Trap Zone cannot be destroyed by card effects. You can only use each of the following effects of "Centur-Ion Arkcoela" once per turn. If this card is Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Centur-Ion" card from your Deck to your hand. During the End Phase: You can place 1 non-Synchro "Centur-Ion" monster from your GY or banishment face-up in your Spell & Trap Zone as a Continuous Trap.
